p: A previous study investigated the mode of action of Thyme vulgaris EO, against Rhizopus oryzae, via interaction with ergosterol, and verified that this EO can interact with the fungal membrane, as evidenced by increasing MIC values in the presence of ergosterol. 67 Another study demonstrated that Laurus nobilis EO may interfere have two mechanisms of action against C. albicans, (cell wall biosynthesis and ionic permeability of the fungal cell membrane), considering that increased MIC values for this EO are observed in the presence of ergosterol and sorbitol. 28
